product.title: The Reversible Bucket Hat in Feather Grey
product.body_html: Make the most of your summer bucket list with this reversible bucket hat. Made from organic cotton, it features a flag label on the side and can easily be paired it with a camp collar shirt for a classic summer look. 58.5cm circumference.
